Name: Bargain
Description: Items can be bought at a lower price from shops in dungeons

Name: Blast Control
Description: Damage your team takes from explosions is reduced.

Name: Brawl
Description: The more enemies there are in a room, the more powerful your moves will be

Name: Defensive Rhythm
Description: Whenever your pokémon are hit by attacks, their Defense and Sp. Def are boosted. The effect only lasts for 1 turn.

Name: Evasive Rhythm
Description: Whenever Pokémon are hit by attacks, their evasiveness is boosted, making it easier to dodge attacks. The effect only lasts for 1 turn.

Name: Food Finder
Description: You're more likely to see Tiny Apples in dungeons

Name: Forge a Path
Description: You can break through walls as you walk. But your Belly gets significantly emptier if you break walls and you can't break any more walls if your Belly reaches 0

Name: Friendly
Description: Pokémon you battle against are more likely to become your friends

Name: Funnel Fun
Description: The rate at which HP restores naturally when Pokémon are in a corridor is greatly sped up

Name: Leap Ahead
Description: The Pokémon behind you in a ocrridor jumps in front and uses a 1-tile move. After it uses the move, that Pokémon returns to its original spot

Name: Leave Half
Description: An Apple, Max Ether or Tiny Reviver Seed will remain in your bag after you use a Big Apple, Perfect Apple, Max Elixir or Reviver Seed

Name: Link Boost
Description: The power of linked moves is boosted. The more moves are linked, the more powerful they become

Name: Lonely Courage
Description: When a Pokémon has no nearby teammates, it gets very strong

Name: Mind Over Matter
Description: When a Pokémonsteps on a Wonder Title, its strength is restored, its bad conditions such as being poisoned or burned also heal

Name: Moving Up
Description: Move Exp. Earned when you use moves in a dungeon is increased more than usual

Name: Narrow Focus
Description: Moves used in corridors will never miss

Name: Notorious Fasting
Description: Pokémon won't take damage even when their Belly reaches 0. Beweare that HP won't restore naturally while the Pokémon's Belly is empty, and they will take damage if they're in a wall

Name: Notorious Healing
Description: The rate at which HP restores naturally is sped up

Name: Notorious Restoration
Description: When you use items that help restore HP or fill your Belly, those items will restore more than usual

Name: PP Pouch
Description: The PP of a learned move restores a bit when an enemy is defeated

Name: Rapid Bull's-Eyes
Description: Moves that hit multiple times will never miss

Name: Recoil Boost
Description: Moves that have recoil damage or moves that hurt the user if they miss are greatly powered up

Name: Riled Up
Description: Attack and Sp. Atk are boosted when you take damage from an enemy

Name: Sales Pitch
Description: Items can be sold at a higher price to shops in dungeons

Name: Shared Happiness
Description: When a teammate's bad conditions are healed, a bad condition of another team member also gets healed.

Name: Small Stomach
Description: Whatever food you eat, it will fill your Belly completely

Name: Squad Up
Description: The more members you have on your team, the more likely it is that Pokémon you battle against will want to be your friends

Name: Squeeze Out
Description: The PP of a move that has 0 PP may sometimes be restored

Name: Steamroll
Description: Even moves that have no effect or are not very effective due to Abilities or bad type matchups will be able to steamroll opponents and deal damage

Name: Strike Back
Description: When the Pokémon takes damage from an adjacent enemy, it reduces the Attack and Sp. Atk of that enemy

Name: Thrown Item Boost
Description: Spikes and stones are powered up. On top of that, enemies won't be able to catch items

Name: Tight Formation
Description: The more team members there are nearby, the lower the damage will be when Pokémon are hit by wide-ranging moves, such as Magnitude

Name: Wary Walk
Description: When a Pokémon steps on a trap, the trap may be broken and disabled

Name: XP Boost
Description: The EXP. Points Pokémon earn after defeating an enemy in a dungeon are boosted
